scene.name: Folding setup
scene.description: A flat surface with a short-sleeve t-shirt

task.name: Fold and unfold short-sleeve shirt
task.description: Fold a t-shirt neatly and then unfold it back to the original spread state
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice folding clothes. The goal is to fold this t-shirt neatly, and then unfold it back to its original state.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要进行叠衣服任务。目标是将这件短袖T恤叠整齐，然后再把它展开恢复原状。

subtasks.description: Execute the folding and unfolding sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please fold the shirt and then unfold it.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请先叠好衣服，然后再把它展开。

steps.description: Spread the shirt flat and smooth out wrinkles
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: spread the shirt completely flat and smooth out any wrinkles with your hands.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：把衣服完全铺平，用手抚平所有的褶皱。

steps.description: Fold the left side towards the center
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: fold the left sleeve and about a quarter of the body towards the center.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把左边的袖子和部分衣身向中间折叠。

steps.description: Fold the right side towards the center
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: fold the right side towards the center so it overlaps slightly.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：把右边的袖子和衣身也向中间折叠，形成长条状。

steps.description: Fold the bottom up to the neckline (Complete Folding)
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: fold the bottom hem up to the neckline to finish folding.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：把衣服下摆向上翻折对齐领口，完成折叠。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step five: unfold the bottom half back down.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第五步：把刚才折上去的下摆展开，放回去。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step six: unfold the right side back to the right.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第六步：把右边的折叠展开，恢复到右边。

steps.description: Unfold the left side and smooth out
steps.spoken_prompt: Step seven: unfold the left side and smooth the shirt flat again.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第七步：把左边的折叠展开，并将衣服重新铺平，恢复原样。

constraints.notes: Folding should be neat; when restoring, ensure the shirt is spread out flat again similar to the starting state.
